thread.title: Peter Reynolds

author: Peter Reynolds
title: Peter Reynolds
text: The book was received safely from World of Rare Books/World of Books in excellent condition. However I am not certain that the level of packaging was appropriate to the age and weight of the book, though on this occasion this particular book travelled very well. I'm a bit puzzled about being asked to put up a Trustpilot review for Biblio, since Biblio is only a marketplace for a private transaction between the customer and the seller. Biblio itself does not sell books, pack books up, or choose a shipping method.
